document.full_text: kobe bryant scored 24 points to lead the lakers to a 98-80 victory over the hornets, and joe johnson had 23 points as the hawks ousted the magic.
document.title: roundup: lakers and hawks advance to round 2
lines_and_colors: kobe bryant scored 24 points to lead the lakers to a 98-80 victory over the hornets, and joe johnson had 23 points as the hawks ousted the magic.
